thread.title: Meet the Firm that First Bought Snap at 98 Cents a Share
thread.title_full: Meet the Firm that First Bought Snap at 98 Cents a Share - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Rolfe Winkler
title: Meet the Firm that First Bought Snap at 98 Cents a Share
text: Dennis Phelps “didn’t know what to make of young, wiry, t-shirt wearing Stanford dropout” he met for breakfast one January 2013 morning, at least initially. But after Evan Spiegel started talking about his company chat, Mr. Phelps says he was blown away. The meeting was the start of what became a “full-court press” by Mr.   Trump Trade Pushes Gold, Dollar Further Apart
